content:
Building a hunter's blind has proven difficult without trees or underbrush, but after some effort, you think you've found a solution in the form of a couple enormous mushroom caps, some wall paneling, and plenty of vines to disguise the shape. You sit inside, and wait.

Soon, you hear a rumbling down the main tunnel, and the vibrating rustle of hundreds of legs tipped with chitinous spikes. Another moment, and the scuttlebus emerges from the gloom, barreling toward you.

Flip the ONE THOUSAND LEGS (WILD SCUTTLEBUS) card over to the BEFORE THE MANDIBLES side, but don't change your mission log. If you don't complete the confrontation today, you will have to track it down again.

Put the Wild Scuttlebus into play within reach of a Ranger of your choice and attach BEFORE THE MANDIBLES to it. Do not read its entry. Return all set-aside features to the collection.

If you have STAGED THE HUNT, go to 129.1.
